headline.main: South Korea Prosecutor Paves Way for Charges Against Park if Impeachment Upheld
headline.print_headline: South Korea Prosecutor Paves Way for Charges Against Park if Impeachment Upheld

lead_paragraph: South Korean President Park Geun-hye colluded with a friend to take bribes from Samsung Group aimed at cementing Samsung Chief Jay Y. Lee's control of the conglomerate, the special prosecutor's office said on Monday, paving the way for Park to be prosecuted if removed from office.
